website_summaries.verdict: To keep up with modern day sneaker styles, the Etnies Barge LS ditched the traditional bulky silhouette of skate shoes and went for a sleeker and more streamlined shape without sacrificing its functionality. It boasts of durable, low-top construction with a vulcanized sole for great board feel. But if you want to prolong your pair's life, then it is recommended to use it strictly as a casual everyday shoe.The Barge LS shoe’s comfort, versatility, and an affordable cost were deemed as deciding factors for most of the users.
pros: Most reviewers praise the Etnies Barge LS straight-forward and sleek design as stylish
Its excellent grip is said to perform great in activities such as skateboarding and BMX-ing
Comfortable is a common word used to describe this pair
A significant number of shoe users commend the kick's quality materials and construction
This shoe is available in a wide array of colorway options
The sneaker's simple aesthetic makes for easy pairing with almost any casual ensemble
Some consumers who consciously choose not to use shoes made from any animal material were delighted that this pair in the charcoal/heather colorway is vegan-friendly
Majority of the wearers mention that it is very durable
Most reviewers say that they recommend the Barge LS from Etnies
At $55, most buyers find this shoe to be a bargain
cons: Several skaters share that the pair didn’t last long when used for skateboarding
Some purchasers disclose that this shoe easily gets dirty

customer_reviews.title: I bought those shoes to have a good pair for a travel in few days and now ...
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I could such a cheap quality, I doubt those shoes are actually the real deal and this is probably why it was cheaper. I used this shoes just to walk my dog less than ten times as I wear work boots and cycling shoes daily. I bought those shoes to have a good pair for a travel in few days and now have nothing. There is already a massive hole on the heel and now rubs on plastic and hurt feet. This happen to my converse, emerica and older etnies after wearing them for way over 3 years... not even a moth in.. this is just ridiculous.. I have a cheap pair of supermarket shoes that last longer.
customer_reviews.author: nico

customer_reviews.title: Suitable rad for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love the trainers - love the colours - bit redder in person. Nice as expected fit. Kwool and just waaaaay cooler than my Vans imo (yes Vans are amazing) - So overdone right now and everybody seems to rock em - Don't know about you, but that's a really big turn off for me. (I'm old and remember the BMX 80's daze - they were exotic then.) Anyway rant over, these now win on style points imo. Not sure how they are for skating, I still have a couple of decks - but it's been 3 years at least since I've been out. They're probably great though. Thanks peeps ",..^
customer_reviews.author: jman jr

customer_reviews.title: Design fault.
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my son who has previously bought very similar Etnies shoes twice before. This shoe is a little different which we hadn't realized in style but not much. They seemed fine but once he started to walk in them thick plastic in the heel started to cut through and he had to cut it out. The back is now unsupported and so the heel collapses. Strange design fault so would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ScarlettWebb

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price. This is the main reason I purchased these. I bought these as a present, the recipient was pleased. They fit well. Look good. Would recommend. Although, when I purchased these, the colour in the product photo was brown. I was surprised when they arrived that they were grey. But looking through my order, it did state that they were grey, it was not very clear though. Regardless of this fact, for the price ipaid, I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: Big Rhonda.

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Looks like these trainers have been worn before or a defect. Stitching appears to show adhesive, not sure why...
customer_reviews.author: Harry L.

customer_reviews.title: For occasional use
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on these I thought id give them a go. Now having had them for a while I can report they the top part of the shoe has done pretty well. The sole however seems to have lost all its spring. Feel like I might as well walk bear footed with the lack of comfort on the sole. Other than that they've lasted pretty well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and unable to wear as not stuck together.
customer_reviews.text: Rubber around the sole was not stuck to the base.I thought these were supposed to be a quality shoe like the Nike SB but this is the first and last time I will be buying these.We thought we would give them a go for a change from Vans and Nike but that was a mistake.Bought them to take on holiday and only opened them there as they were a gift for my daughter.Rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: As Good As They Look!
customer_reviews.text: Quality Brand, Great fit. The reason for the -1 is that I found the material, much like any shoes, has to wear in before its completely comfortable. where the toe bends it can cause discomfort. Otherwise they are very soft internally. These are more BMX Trainers, as the wear on the Board Grip will destroy these. Luckily for me, I don't do either any more so they look good and will last me a long time. They look just like the Pictures.
customer_reviews.author: IHDesign

customer_reviews.title: Quality trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoes although I don’t skate anymore. The style is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B. Garrod

customer_reviews.title: Etenies trainer
customer_reviews.text: Good product and service as soon is size 13 it’s quite difficult to buy for him so very pleased
customer_reviews.author: DebCoul56

customer_reviews.title: Dope sneeks
customer_reviews.text: Far and away the best Etnies sneeks on the market
customer_reviews.author: Ste

customer_reviews.title: You plant a tree buying those shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Nice colour, good grip with the sole, stylish and comfortable. Good for skateboarding and is ecologically correct. Buying the shoes you plant a tree, according to a tag on the insole.
customer_reviews.author: BØASXPRS

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband, look lovely and very comfortable. Would recommend. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart in weeks - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Having worn skate shoes of this style (and often brand) for over a decade, I was appalled to find that these fall apart with minimal use (walking to-from/around work and to the shops) within a matter of weeks. For a tenner cheaper than my usual brand, this is a huge false economy.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Morris

customer_reviews.title: Received incorrect size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered UK size 10, received UK size 9.5. Shoes are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit but great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and quality looks fantastic, unfortunately these were too narrow for my fat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed-shoe had normal wear for 30mins and the sole started the separate from the upper at the point the toes bend. Requested return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I find that the left shoe is a bit uncomfortable after a few hours
customer_reviews.author: Giobertti Morantes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with these thank you. He reports that they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: 1 month old and falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Falling apart already. Have had them a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They might feel too stiff in the beginning, but after couple uses, they start to get more flexible and keep up with our pace until it feels comfortable. I really like the quality and am totally satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Diogo F.

customer_reviews.title: Scuffs on a brand new pair of £55 trainers what is this eBay?
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this item they look like someone’s already tried them on and the Suede has been scuffed back and front not what I was expecting should have been listed light wear and tear would expect to find these in tkmaxx for £20 Can’t fault the speed of delivery and design of the shoe just very little care taken when packaging product
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

product_meta.title: Etnies Barge Ls, Mens Technical Skateboarding Shoes
